column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2016
column14: I have been using this lip pencil for years, and it is the best red lipstick I have ever used (and I have tried many). It is so soft and creamy, goes on smooth and doesn't crack. The color is gorgeous too and last quite a while. I only reapply just a bit after lunch if needed. Otherwise it lasts all day.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
column14: Long wearing and gives great color. I love it!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
column14: Mirabella is a great brand that my esthetician/makeup artist got me hooked on. The color was true to the pic and it stayed on til I washed my face. Will definitely order another shade soon

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2018
column14: Good color and it goes on easily.  However, it will not color the "inside" of my lips where they are moist, and this makes it look a little weird when that part of my lips shows.  I have to keep my mouth closed.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2017
column14: Very smooth gonig on and, for a celiac, the bonus of being gluten free.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2020
column14: Love! Goes on super smooth and keeps lips hydrated.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2015
column14: This would be better if you could sharpen it after it gets low. This is way to expensive for not being able to sharpen it. It last maybe 3 weeks. I think it is a waste of money.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
column14: Good lipstick. Just not the color I expected it to be.
